Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2011 11:39PM itzmeshel wrote: Woo Hoo, NED!  I just started taking Neurontin for my neuropthy problems.  It seems to be helping me, the generic is called Gabapentin.  My fingers weren't bad, but my toes were hurting so bad I couldn't sleep well.  Good luck to you and again, Congrats!
